bioprojects.title: Microbacterium sp. SMR1 Genome sequencing and assembly

assembly_info.submitter: CSIR-Central Institute of Medicinal and Aromatic Plants

description.title: Microbe sample from Microbacterium sp. SMR1
description.comment: Microbacterium sp. SMR1, a gram positive bacterium, a member of the phylum Actinobacteria, isolated as endophyte from roots of field grown Papaver somniferum plants of cv. Sampada.
